law.catch_line: CHARGE IN LIEU OF ASSESSMENT ON PROPERTY NOT ASSESSED.

structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - WATER AND SEWER EXTENSION POLICIES

section.text: If property to be served by a water or sewer line is to be connected to a line constructed on an assessment basis pursuant to the provisions of §§8-2031 through 8-2036 of this Code and no assessment was made against the property for its proportionate part of the line because ownership of the property would not permit the collection of an assessment, then either at the time of connection as provided in §10-6081(e) or presentation of a subdivision for recordation, whichever occurs first, there shall be collected, in addition to all other charges provided herein, or by other law, or ordinance, or resolution, the amount which would have been assessed against the property to be served by the line had such property been assessable at the time the line was constructed.
